Hikayeler.aciklama: Once upon a time there were a merchant dad and his three daughters living together. One day, the father would go to far away for a couple days and he asked his daughters about what they want.

A queen gives birth to a daughter. She names her Snow White. The queen dies. Snow White’s father marries an evil woman. This evil queen has a magic mirror that tells her she is the fairest in the land.

Hikayeler.baslik: Bilinçaltı Engelleri Kaldırma ve Hedeflerine Ulaşma Meditasyonu
Hikayeler.aciklama: Bu meditasyonun amacı bilinçaltında saklı kalan engelleri kaldırmak ve bizi hedeflerimize yaklaştırmaktır.
